name: Andrélon Conditioner iedere dag
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Zonnebloemolie), Dimethicone, Parfum, Lactic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, PEG-150 Distearate, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
